name: Handcrafted Mobile
description:
Handrafted Mobile is a software house from Poland. We specialize and provide top mobile services. Our team offers consulting services to companies looking for rapid business development. Currently, we are expanding Virtual Reality & Games team! The company’s core technologies include: iOS Android, React programming, Unity(Game & VR), Ruby On Rails, HTML, CSS, HTML5 ,Node.js/AngularJS, .Net.
Work experience with: - big digital agencies, - famous startups, - enterprises.
Handcrafted Mobile support of local IT groups & students initiatives, e.g. Mobile Bialystok, Programistok, BialJam & EastRobo.
During our Mobile experience we established solutions for:
- Clean architecture code structure for business solutions (easier long-term maintenance)
- Automated unit, integration, and UI testing (improves builds stability and prevents regression issues)
- Continuous integration and delivery (fast and easy delivery for mid-development builds)
- Team experience: all our specialists share the same office space and help each other
- We are known as leaders of mobile technology on local market
